entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gander
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:43 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Pellets, -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gander Int'l Airport 12:09 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Ice Pellets
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: ESE 51 km/h gust 74 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain changing to rain near noon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 this evening. Temperature rising to 6 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
